name: Pixl-shift
description:
A brain tingling puzzle game (not match 3, though i respect those too) where you reorganize tiles to match images receiving points depending on the number of movements, in order to unlock even more puzzles as you go.

A game by Jaime Sttivend game.

Assets used under Creative commons by licence :
